title: Pingala Cafe and Eatery
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, International, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering
description: The area's first vegan cafe is located on the Winooski River where nourishment and a sense of community meet, eat, and share. Offers creative and comforting plant-based dishes using organic produce. Has gluten-free choices. Drinks include fresh juices, smoothies, tea and coffee/espresso. Lots of to-go items. Free Wi-Fi.
